file_content.text: Nem'ro sends his regards.
Nice work. Fa'athra will think twice the next time he muscles in on Nem'ro's business.
Glad to hear it.
Make sure I get the credit.
Don't worry. I never forget a good hired gun. Enjoy your credits.
Can I go now?
Yep. Nem'ro will be very pleased. Enjoy your credits, pal.
Keep your eyes open. Lots of dark corners down in those tunnels.
You don't look like one of Fa'athra's men.
Yeah, point me out to the whole world, why don't you? I'm Gedron. Nem'ro pays me to look into problems for him--like losing his factories.
Factory on the other side used to belong to Nem'ro, but Fa'athra's taken over. Now, he's churning out guns to use against Nem'ro. It's bad for business.
If you pay me right, I could be very bad for Fa'athra's business.
Want to turn the tables?
I'm good at making problems go away, if you're interested.
Why don't I handle it for you?
You got yourself a deal.
Bad things happen.
How about making yourself useful instead of spouting sarcasm at me? Nem'ro would pay well to have this little problem dealt with, you know.
I'll leave you to it, then.
Stick around, do yourself a favor. I've got a lot of credits here for anybody who deals with this little problem for Nem'ro.
The access tunnels will get you into the factory. Fa'athra's got lots of gunmen down there, but not nearly as many as he should.
See, the factory's security terminals are in the tunnels. Shut those down, and you can trash Fa'athra's whole operation--his equipment, his droids, his engineers--everything.
Perfect.
Sure--nothing better to do.
No time like the present, then. Go give Fa'athra something to think about.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
Suit yourself. But you're missing out on a golden opportunity.
This isn't exactly a good time for a chat.
